  1. from django.db.models.fields.files import FileField, ImageField
  2. from easy_thumbnails import files
  5. class ThumbnailerField(FileField):
  6. """
  7. A file field which provides easier access for retrieving (and generating)
  8. thumbnails.
  10. To use a different file storage for thumbnails, provide the
  11. ``thumbnail_storage`` keyword argument.
  12. """
  13. attr_class = files.ThumbnailerFieldFile
  15. def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
  16. # Arguments not explicitly defined so that the normal ImageField
  17. # positional arguments can be used.
  18. self.thumbnail_storage = kwargs.pop('thumbnail_storage', None)
  20. super(ThumbnailerField, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
  22. def south_field_triple(self):
  23. """

  25. """

  32. class ThumbnailerImageField(ThumbnailerField, ImageField):
  33. """
  34. An image field which provides easier access for retrieving (and generating)
  35. thumbnails.
  37. To use a different file storage for thumbnails, provide the
  38. ``thumbnail_storage`` keyword argument.
  40. To thumbnail the original source image before saving, provide the
  41. ``resize_source`` keyword argument, passing it a usual thumbnail option
  42. dictionary. For example::
  44. ThumbnailerImageField(
  45. ..., resize_source=dict(size=(100, 100), sharpen=True))
  46. """
  47. attr_class = files.ThumbnailerImageFieldFile
  49. def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
  50. # Arguments not explicitly defined so that the normal ImageField
  51. # positional arguments can be used.
  52. self.resize_source = kwargs.pop('resize_source', None)
  54. super(ThumbnailerImageField, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
  56. def south_field_triple(self):
  57. """
  58. Return a suitable description of this field for South.
  59. """
  60. from south.modelsinspector import introspector
  61. field_class = 'django.db.models.fields.files.ImageField'
  62. args, kwargs = introspector(self)
  63. return (field_class, args, kwargs)
